file.name: nestedschema.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Life Contract changes
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
  description: |
    change requests for life contracts.
servers:
  - url: http://rnextshowcase.westeurope.azurecontainer.io
paths:
  /life/contract:
    put:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/FundChangeData'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
components:
  schemas:
    FundChangeData:
      type: object
      properties:
        product:
          type: string
        portfolio:
          type: object
          properties:
            name:
              type: string
            shares:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PortfolioShare'
    PortfolioShare:
      type: object
      properties:
        percentage:
          type: integer
